credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions:
H x W x D: 13 x 20 x 15.9 cm (5 1/8 x 7 7/8 x 6 1/4in.)
H (with handle): 22 cm (8 11/16 in.)
title: Teapot
description: Ginger body, molded.  Paneled octagonal body with short curved spout and circular lid with flattened knob finial.  Attached to posts on shoulder is bronze bail-like handle in form of two dolphins rising upward.  Low-relief underglaze decoration on front and back of prunus sprigs in white, blue-gray and brown slips on the ginger ground.  Shoulder and top painted burnt-siena.  Gilt accents on the top, spout and two of the sides.  Bottom and interior glazed.  Clear glaze with fine cracklature.
name: Teapot
